target: In more than half of the ophthalmology training programs, internal, provincial and international collaboration is a key feature of ophthalmic training.

source: 尽管可能并不总是循证的, 但该地区的专业细化仍被推动着。
target: Although it may not always be evidence-based, professional specialization in this area is still pushed forward.

source: 现有的SSA地区眼科医疗和外科培训已发表的科学数据很少, 特别是法语和葡萄牙语国家。
target: There is little published scientific data in available training in ophthalmic medicine and surgery in SSA regions, particularly in French and Portuguese speaking countries.

source: 然而, 通过广泛的审查策略, 我们有可能获得SSA眼科培训宝贵而详细的全貌。
target: However, by extensive review strategies, it is possible to obtain a valuable and detailed full view of ophthalmic training for SSA.

source: 眼科医生的培训是一项复杂而又多方面的任务。
target: The training of an ophthalmologist is a complex and multifaceted task.

source: 现有的培训机构面临着合适的选择、能力和资金方面的挑战。
target: The existing training institutions are faced with appropriate selective, competent, and financial challenges.

source: 许多学习成果需要课程、时间、师资、支持和适当的评估。
target: Many of the learning outcomes require a class, time, mentors, support and appropriate evaluation.

source: 现代培训方法提供了很多机会。
target: Modern training methods offer a lot of opportunities –.

source: 合作是关键。
target: Co-operation is critical.

source: 骨肉瘤是最常见的骨恶性肿瘤。
target: Osteosarcoma is the most common bone malignancy.

source: 从20世纪70年代起，人类就开始使用化学治疗药物来治疗骨肉瘤。
target: Since the 111000 s, humans have been using chemotherapeutic agents to treat osteosarcoma.

source: 然而，多药耐药作为影响化学治疗药物疗效的主要不良反应之一，在不同程度上降低了骨肉瘤患者的生存率。
target: However, multidrug resistance as one of the major adverse effects affecting the efficacy of chemotherapeutic agents has reduced survival in patients with osteosarcoma to varying degrees.

source: Notch信号通路在骨肉瘤细胞增殖中起重要作用，同时通过减少细胞内药物累积、调控上皮-间质转化、导致微RNA失调和细胞凋亡基因的表达紊乱、调节肿瘤干细胞等方面影响肿瘤的耐药性。
target: Notch signaling plays an important role in osteosarcoma cell proliferation, which also influences tumor resistance by reducing intracellular drug accumulation, regulating epithelial-to-mesenchymal transformation, leading to miRNA dysregulation and dysregulation of apoptosis genes, and regulating cancer stem cells.

source: 研究多发性骨髓瘤（MM）患者骨髓中结缔组织生长因子（CTGF）水平及其与骨髓瘤溶骨性病变的关系，探讨CTGF在多发性骨髓瘤骨病中的临床意义。
target: To investigate the levels of connective tissue growth factor (CTGF) in the bone marrow of patients with multiple myeloma (MM) and its association with osteolytic lesions of myeloma, we investigated the clinical significance of CTGF in multiple myeloma osteopathy.

source: 选取2019年3月-2020年4月在本院接受治疗的MM患者54例，同时选取28例健康志愿者作为对照组，收集受试者骨髓后分离骨髓上清，采用双抗体夹心酶标免疫分析法（ELISA）检测骨髓上清液中CTGF蛋白表达水平，分析其与临床相关指标之间的关系. MM患者的CTGF水平显著高于健康对照组 （P<0.001）；男性患者CTGF水平明显高于女性患者（P=0.007）；有骨病组的MM患者CTGF水平明显高于无骨病组的患者和对照组（P=0.007，P=0.001）。
target: Fifty-four patients with MM who were treated in our hospital from March 2019 to April 2020, and 28 healthy volunteers were selected as controls. After collecting the bone marrow, bone marrow supernatants were separated, and CTGF protein levels in the bone marrow supernatants were measured by double-antibody clamping enzyme standard immunoassay (ELISA) to analyze their relationship with clinically relevant indicators. CTGF levels were significantly higher in patients with MM than in healthy controls (P< 0.001); CTGF levels were significantly higher in male patients than in female patients (P= 0.007); Patients with MM with osteopathy had significantly higher CTGF levels than those without osteopathy (P= 0.007, P= 0.001).

source: MM患者的CTGF水平与骨损害的病灶数呈正相关（r=0.52），≥3处骨损害患者骨髓CTGF水平显著高于<3处骨损害患者和无骨损害患者 （P=0.014，P=0.002）。
target: CTGF levels in MM were positively correlated with the number of lesions in bone lesions (r= 0.02), and marrow CTGF levels were significantly higher in patients with ≥ 3 bone lesions than in those with < 3 bone lesions (P= 0.014, P= 0.002).

source: ROC曲线结果表明，CTGF表达水平对于MM骨病的诊断有显著的价值（P<0.001）。
target: The results of the ROC curves indicate that CTGF expression levels are valuable for the diagnosis of bone disease in MM (P< 0.001).

source: MM患者CTGF水平异常高表达与骨髓瘤溶骨性病变的程度相关，能反映MM疾病的进展。
target: Abnormal overexpression of CTGF levels in MM patients is associated with the extent of osteolytic lesions of myeloma and is able to reflect the progression of MM disease.

source: 空气中污染物及病菌的浓度直接影响人类健康。
target: The concentrations of air pollutants and bacteria directly affect human health.

source: 在污染源不变的情况下,有效通风决定了空气质量的优劣。
target: Effective ventilation determines the quality of air in the presence of unchanged sources of contamination.

source: 因此,建立有效通风的定量判定指标,并利用此指标对特定区域空气质量进行实时评价,引导居民选择健康的室外活动场所成为迫切需要解决的问题。
target: Thus, establishing quantitative measures of effective ventilation and utilizing this indicator to provide real-time assessment of air quality in specific areas, and guiding residents to select healthy outdoor places of activity becomes an urgent problem to be addressed.

source: 本研究采用雷诺平均Navier-Stokes(RANS)方法建立了基于计算流体力学(CFD)技术的城市空气污染模拟系统,研究了风速、污染物浓度和污染物扩散效率之间的关系。
target: In this study, an urban air pollution simulation system based on the Calculating Fluid Mechanics (CFD) technique was developed using the Raynaud's Mean Navier-Ages (RANS) method to investigate the relationship between wind velocity, contaminant concentration, and efficiency of contaminant spread.

source: 在此基础上,借助实时气象数据,对城市广场空间不同时段进行了风场模拟及空气质量评价。
target: On the basis of this, wind field simulation and air quality evaluation were performed for different time periods of the urban agar space with the help of real-time metaregression data.

source: 结果表明: 行人高度(1.5 m)空气中污染物有效扩散的临界风速值为1.0 m·s
target: The results indicated that the critical wind velocity value for the effective spread of the air pollutants was 1.0 m·s at a walker height (1.5 m).

source: 为实现世界卫生组织提出的"2030年消除病毒性肝炎作为重大公共卫生威胁"的目标，慢性乙型肝炎（CHB）治疗药物的研发领域近年正处于快速发展阶段。
target: To achieve the World Health Organization's proposed target of 2030 to eliminate viral hepatitis as a major public health threat, the field of development of drugs for chronic hepatitis B (CHB) has been in rapid development in recent years.

source: 早期临床试验（包括首次人体试验）关注于受试者的选择、研究设计、给药剂量和方式的选择、剂量爬坡、不良事件/反应（耐受性评价）的监测、观察和报告程序，以及受试者继续给药和停止给药的标准。
target: Early clinical trials (including the first human trial) focused on subject selection, study design, selection of doses and modalities of administration, dose climbing, monitoring of adverse events/reactions (tolerability evaluation), observation and reporting procedures, as well as the participant's criteria of continuing and stopping administration.

source: 需要引入定量药理学知识来分析药物的体内暴露量与药效、不良反应的关系，以及纳入探索性指标：乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）RNA、HBV核心相关抗原（HBcrAg）等，来分析新药作用机制和靶点及其抗肝细胞内HBV共价闭合环状DNA的药效。
target: Quantitative pharmacological knowledge is required to analyze the relationship between exposure to drug exposure and drug efficacy, adverse effects, and the inclusion of exploratory parameters: hepatitis B virus (HBV) RNA, HBV core related antigen (HBcrAg), etc., to analyze the mechanism of action of new drugs and the efficacy of their covalently closed circular DNA against HBV in hepatocytes.

source: 而II～III期临床试验则更关注最佳剂量、疗效、安全性指标，验证新药在更大受试者人群范围内所选择剂量的疗效和安全性。
target: Phase II to III trials, on the other hand, are more focused on optimal dosage, efficacy, and safety measures and examine the efficacy and safety of new drugs at doses chosen in a larger subject population.

source: 根据国内外有关文献，并结合作者早期临床研究的实践经验,简要介绍CHB创新性药物临床试验设计中应关注的临床问题。
target: Simplified presentation of the clinical issues that should be focused on in the design of an innovative CHB clinical trial is based on relevant literature at home and at home and in light of the authors'practice experience in early clinical research.

source: 在乌干达，每五个儿童中就有一个孩子存在这样或那样的心理健康问题，其中包括破坏性行为障碍(DBDs )。
target: In Uganda, one in every five children has mental health problems like this or so, including disruptive behavior disorders (DBDs).

source: DBDs 可以持续到成年期，带来诸多不良后果。
target: DBDs can persist in adulthood, with many consequences.

source: 在发达国家的高度贫困社区，针对DBDs的有效干预措施已经得到开发和测试。
target: Effective interventions for DBDs have been developed and tested in highly poor communities in developed countries.

source: 但是在乌干达这样的大多数非洲国家，相关的干预措施仍属罕见。
target: However, in most African countries such as Uganda, the relevant interventions are still rare.

source: 该论文描述了一项源自美国的循证干预措施在乌干达的国情下如何尽可能优化并保持原有效度的调适过程。
target: This paper describes how an evidence-based intervention from the USA optimizes and maintains the original efficacy process as far as possible under national conditions in Uganda.

source: 作为一项随机测试的部分内容，本文调查研究了乌干达的30所学校中表现出行为问题的青少年及其他们的照顾者。
target: As part of a randomized trial, we investigated adolescents and their caregivers in 30 schools in Uganda.

source: 研究过程涉及以下方面：初期组织校长和老师参加集会，介绍本研究的内容和干预措施的主要概念；在起始阶段组织乌干达团队对4Rs和2Ss相关内容进行了整体学习；邀请社区利益相关者积极参与并针对干预措施的内容和文化相关性提供更多的反馈；指导手册的最终修订版；收集儿童的绘画作品，以供编辑手册时使用。
target: The study process involves the following: During the initial period, the head and teacher were organized to participate in a meeting to present the contents of this study and the main concepts of interventions; The Ugandan team was organized for an overall learning of 4Rs and 2Ss related content during the initial phase; Community interests were invited to actively participate and give more feedback on the content and cultural relevance of the intervention; Final revision of the Guidance Manual; The child's drawing was collected for use when editing the manual.

source: 本文描述了原有干预措施和调整后的干预方案在内容方面以及实施方法上的异同。
target: This article describes the inclusion and adjustment of the original intervention in terms of content and implementation methods.

source: 研究结果还强调了让社区利益相关者参与调适修改过程的重要性。
target: The findings also highlight the importance of involving community unrelated individuals in the process of adjustment and modification.

source: 总结跟腱病的分类、诊断和临床治疗方案的研究进展。
target: Advancements in the classification, diagnosis, and clinical management options of Achilles tendinopathy have been summarized.

source: 检索国内外与跟腱病相关的研究文献，主要对其分类及名称、影像学诊断和临床治疗方案等方面的研究成果进行总结。
target: We searched the literature of studies related to Achilles tendinopathy at home and abroad and gave a summary of the results of the studies on its classification and name, imaging diagnosis, and clinical treatment plan.

source: 跟腱病的分类和名称未完全统一，概念模糊，病因尚未明确，治疗方案较多，但缺乏有效的循证医学研究。
target: The classification and name of Achilles tendinopathy is not fully unified, the concept is vague, the etiology is not yet clear, there are many treatment options, but effective evidence-based medical research is lacking.

source: 跟腱病的诊断和治疗复杂，需依据跟腱解剖学和病因学特点，进一步明确其分类和定义，以更有效指导临床治疗，方便经验交流与学习。
target: The diagnosis and treatment of Achilles tendinopathy is complex, and it is necessary to further clarify its classification and definition based on the anatomical and etiological features of Achilles tendon, so as to more effectively guide clinical treatment and facilitate the exchange of experience and learning.

source: 人工智能是在电子计算机技术基础上迅速发展起来的科学技术，已应用于人类社会的许多方面，在医学领域的应用也越来越广泛，人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展和应用可在一定程度上引领口腔医学的未来。
target: Artificial intelligence is a rapidly developed scientific technology on the basis of electronic computer technology and has been used in many aspects of human society.

source_errors.term: 在医学领域的应用也越来越广泛，人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展和应用可在一定程度上引领口腔医学的未来。

source: 口腔医学专业人员需要认知、学习和掌握人工智能技术，紧跟医疗新时代的步伐并在医疗实践中开展应用。
target: Oral medicine professionals need to cognizate, learn and acquire artificial intelligence techniques, keep up with the new era of medical care and apply them in medical practice.

source: 本文就人工智能在口腔医疗、科研、教学中的应用及研究作一介绍，并对人工智能在口腔医学领域的发展进行展望。
target: This article presents the application and research of artificial intelligence in oral medicine, scientific research, teaching and so on the development of artificial intelligence in the field of oral medicine.

source: 直接抗病毒药物（DAAs），是治疗慢性乙型肝炎的重要手段。
target: Direct antiviral drugs (DAAs) are important in the treatment of chronic hepatitis B.

source: DAAs能直接干扰病毒的感染复制过程，减少子代病毒产率，继而影响体内乙型肝炎病毒（HBV）的两种动态平衡，即肝细胞中病毒复制-循环中病毒衰减之间的平衡，共价闭合环状DNA（cccDNA）池补充-cccDNA衰减之间的平衡。
target: DAAs can directly interfere with the infectious replication process of the virus, reduce the viral production rate of progeny, and then affect the balance between the two homeostasis of hepatitis B virus (HBV) in vivo, that is, the balance between viral replication-circulating viral attenuation in hepatocytes, and the balance between covalently closed loop DNA (cccDNA DNA) pool supplementation-cccDNA attenuation.

source: 现有核苷（酸）类似物足以影响第一种平衡，却难以撼动第二种平衡。
target: Existing nucleos (t) ide analogues are sufficient to influence the first balance but difficult to unravel the second.

source: 因此，靶向HBV感染复制的不同环节，开发新型DAAs十分必要。
target: Therefore, targeting different aspects of HBV infection replication, it is necessary to develop novel DAAs.

source: 现从cccDNA池补充-cccDNA衰减这一平衡的两个方面，探讨近期DAAs研发的主要进展。
target: The recent major advances in DAAs development are now explored from two aspects of the balance of the cccDNA pool supplementation-cccDNA decay.

source: 研究STAT3在耐药白血病细胞凋亡及免疫逃逸中的作用，并探讨白血病微小残留病引起的白血病复发的可能机制。
target: To investigate the role of STAT3 in drug-resistant leukemia cell apoptosis and immune escape, and to investigate the possible mechanisms of leukemia relapse caused by leukemic minimal residual disease.

source: 用pcDNA3.1-STAT3质粒转染K562细胞，建立耐药白血病细胞株K562/STAT3细胞。
target: K562 cells were transfected with pcDNA3.1-STAT3 plasmid, and drug-resistant leukemia cell line K562 /STAT3 cells were established.

source: RQ-PCR和（或）Western blot检测空载质粒转染的对照细胞株K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞中STAT3、BAX以及NKG2D配体的表达。
target: RQ-PCR and/or Western blot for expression of STAT3, BAX, and NKG2D ligands in empty plasmid infected control K562 /-and K562 /STAT3 cells.

source: 流式细胞术检测K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞的凋亡情况及NK细胞对K562/-细胞和K562/STAT3细胞的杀伤作用。
target: Flow cytometry for apoptosis of K562 /-and K562 /STAT3 cells and killing of K562 /-and K562 /STAT3 cells by NK cells.

source: K562/STAT3细胞中总STAT3和STAT3磷酸化水平均明显升高，而且其耐药蛋白P-gp mRNA的表达明显升高（P<0.005）。
target: Total STAT3 and STAT3 phosphorylation levels were significantly higher in K562 /STAT3 cells, and the expression of P-gp mRNA was significantly higher in the drug-resistant protein (P< 0.005).

source: 与K562/-细胞相比，K562/STAT3细胞促凋亡基因BAX mRNA的表达水平明显下降（P=0.005），且多柔比星引起的K562/STAT3细胞凋亡明显减少（P=0.002）；用STAT3抑制剂（SH-4-54）处理K562/STAT3细胞后，促凋亡基因BAX mRNA的表达水平明显升高（P=0.017），同时细胞凋亡也明显增加（P=0.005）。
target: The expression level of BAX mRNA, a pro-apoptotic gene of K562 /STAT3 cells, was also markedly decreased by doxorubicin compared with K562 /-cells (p= 0.002). Treatment of K562 /STAT3 cells with a STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54) resulted in a significant increase in BAX mRNA levels (P= 0.017), as well as a significant increase in apoptosis (P= 0.005).

source: 与K562/-细胞相比，K562/STAT3细胞NKG2D配体（MICA和ULBP1）mRNA的表达水平明显下降（P<0.0001），MICA和ULBP1蛋白的表达水平亦明显下降（MICA：P=0.001，ULBP1：P=0.022）；用STAT3抑制剂（SH-4-54）处理K562/STAT3细胞后，MICA mRNA和蛋白表达水平升高（mRNA：P=0.001，蛋白：P=0.002），但ULBP1 mRNA和蛋白无明显改变（mRNA：P=0.137，蛋白：P=0.1905）。
target: mRNA levels of NKG2D ligands (MICA and ULBP1) were also markedly decreased by K562 /STAT3 cells compared with K562 /-cells (P< 0.001), and by MICA and ULBP1 (P= 0.022). Treatment of K562 /STAT3 cells with a STAT3 inhibitor (SH-4-54) resulted in increased MICA mRNA and protein expression (mRNA: P= 0.001, protein: P= 0.002), but no significant changes in ULBP1 mRNA and protein (mRNA: P= 0.037, protein: P= 0.1905).

source: NK细胞对耐药K562/STAT3细胞的杀伤能力较K562/-细胞下降（P=0.002），但是STAT3抑制剂恢复了K562/STAT3细胞对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性（P=0.006）. STAT3磷酸化介导了耐药白血病细胞抗凋亡，降低其对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性。
target: K562 /STAT3 cells had a decreased killing capacity compared with K562 /-cells (P=0.002), but the STAT3 inhibitor restored the killing sensitivity of K562 /STAT3 cells to NK cells (P=0.006). STAT3 phosphorylation mediates resistance to apoptosis in leukemic cells, reducing their killing sensitivity to NK cells.

source: STAT3抑制剂可以促进耐药白血病细胞凋亡并增加其对NK细胞的杀伤敏感性。
target: STAT3 inhibition promotes apoptosis of resistant leukemia cells and increases their killing sensitivity to NK cells.

source: 本研究旨在阐明父母依恋对青少年创伤后生长（PTG）的影响机制。
target: The aim of this study is to elucidate the mechanism of the effect of parental attachment on posttraumatic growth (PTG) in adolescents.

source: 汶川地震发生9年半后，在872名中国青少年使用自我报告问卷进行了评估。
target: Nine and a half years after the occurrence of the earthquake in Wenchuan a self-report questionnaire was evaluated in 872 Chinese adolescents.

source: 结果显示，父母依恋与PTG有直接关联，两个显著的一阶间接（one-step indirect ）（通过公正信念和认知重新评估）关联PTG，两个显著的二阶间接关联（通过公正信念到安全感和通过认知到公正信念）和一个显著的三阶间接关联（通过安全感到公正信念到认知重评）。
target: The results showed direct association of parental attachment to PTG, association of PTG with two prominent one-stage indirect (reassessment and cognitive reassessment), two significant second-order indirect associations (via fair beliefs and by cognition to fair beliefs) and a significant third-order indirect association (cognitive reconsideration by sense of safety).

source: 结果表明，安全感，公正信念和认知重评中介了父母依恋与PTG之间的关联。
target: The results showed that a sense of safety, just beliefs and cognitive reevaluation mediate the association between parental attachment and PTG.

source: 这些研究结果突出了家庭观点的重要性，临床心理学家可以通过帮助他们建立积极的父母依恋来促进青少年的PTG。
target: These findings highlight the importance of family views, and clinical psychologists can facilitate PTG in adolescents by helping them establish positive parental adherence.
